name: Horse Wiener Saga
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a horse that wanted to do more than simple horse things?  NOW YOU CAN! The epic tale of Soloman the horse, who lives in a simple little farm town, as he begins his journey of self enlightenment to learn the ways of the great and powerful speed runners and defeat the evil demons that stand in the way of greatness!

Patch Notes v20180830

 - Top floor of the Rip Runner's tower had a soft locking dead end, this has been fixed.
 - Frahn's charm skill's success rate is now 20%, down from 40%
 - Shippu chan's blinding shot now animates correctly
 - Horse Crazy's damage has been changed.  Instead of calculating more of the enemy's def, it instead uses the same formula as a normal attack but with double the damage variance
 - Their is now spelled right in the opening crawl
 - Philosophy pepe now says Toys the right amount of times.
 - the charm effect is now removed upon taking any damage instead of a 50% chance to be cured on damage
 - the run ripper's damage has been increased slightly.
